data.text: Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God ghaze:
Eghtɨ kɨ kantriba bar dar gumazamiziba bar me inigh izɨ,
Egha me nan gumazamiziba bagha satu gikarara
“Ia Tair ko, Saidonɨn nguibamningɨn adarazi ko, Filistian kantrin danganiba bar,
Kɨ fo, ia nan gol ko, silvan biziba ko, bizir aghuir iveziba bar pɨn kozir avɨriba sara,
Ia Tair ko, Saidon ko, Filistiaba, ia Jerusalem ko, Judan danganir igharazibar gumazamiziba inigha,
Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn kɨ ua me inightɨ,
Kɨ Judabar amamangatɨghtɨ, me ian otariba ko guivibagh ivezam.
Egha God akar kam Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar tongɨn mangɨ a mɨkɨmasa Joel mɨkeme,
Ia uan nguazibagh tuir ainbav soghtɨ, da mɨdorozir sababar mɨn otifigh.
Ia kantrin roghɨra itibar gumazamiziba, ia bar moghɨra zuamɨra izɨ,
Ezɨ God kamaghɨn mɨgei:
Ikɨzir kaba, me bar gumazamizir kuraba!
Gumazamizir bar avɨrim, bar avɨrasemegh kotiam bagh danganir zarir kamɨn uari akuvagham.
Eghtɨ aruem ko iakɨnim mɨtarmeghtɨ,
Ikiavɨra Itir God, Jerusalemɨn aven Saionɨn Mɨghsɨamɨn pamtemɨn deima,
A kamaghɨn mɨgei,
Dughiar kamɨn, wainɨn azenir avɨriba otivigh mɨghsɨaba avegham,
Isipɨn kantri ko Idomɨn kantri, aningɨn mɨdorozir gumaziba iza,
Eghtɨ gumazir, gumazamizir kabav soghezɨ me ariaghireziba,
